name: Celtic Knife, 60cm
description: The Celtic long knife has a sleek blade and resembles old Viking weaponry. This is a perfect companion and is as deadly as is beautiful. Made from durable foam it features a leather wrapped handle and has a fiberglass core.

name: Hunter Sword, 60cm
description: The Hunter Short Sword is intended to be used by those trying to survive outside the protective castle walls, wandering the woodlands in search of their next meal. The straight blade has a partial serrated surface allowing you to use it as a saw for cutting through wood cages. This elegant would be the ideal weapon for a survivalist!

name: Princess Sword, 60cm
description: This tiny sword was specifically designed for your little princess, granting her protection when necessary.  Not every princess wants to play with dolls, some like to fight with the knights and help defend the kingdom.  This high fantasy latex sword has a small handle and can easily be wielded one handed.

name: Machete, 60cm
description: The machete is a useful weapon and can be used in modern post-apocalyptic or medieval Larps. This shows what kind of a brutal world we survive in for one to own such a latex weapon.

name: Kriegsmesser, 60cm
description: The Kriegmesser is a German style war knife that is ideal for infantrymen.  This larp foam weapon helps recreate historical battles and feature a leather wrapped handle with a fiberglass rod.

name: Wakizashi, 60cm
description: Known for the ancient art hari kiri this latex wakizashi will only disembowel your enemies. Honorable or not this short sword should be only wielded by the brave imperialistic warriors known as the Samurai.  However any larp warrior can acquire this perfect weapon and use it in horrifyingly good ways.

name: Elven Short Blade, 60cm
description: A slim and elegant elven latex short blade is the ideal blade for sophisticated warriors. The blade, from tip to pommel, appears as a one-piece and is colored in a quite matt steel look. 60cm

name: Orc Short Sword, 60cm
description: This latex Orc Short Sword is similar in style and size to a machete. The blade is riddled with battle scars, nicks and dents caused by the shear aggressive nature of the Orc race.  Use this weapon when you want to the whites of your enemyâ€™s eyes as you carve them through and through.

name: Elven Short Sword, 60cm
description: The Elven latex Short Sword is reserved for the higher class of elves. This short blade is well balanced and adorned with antique gold relief along the length of its blade and on the pommel. The elves know how to make truly magnificent weapons, and this one will not disappoint.

name: Dark Elf Blade, 60cm
description: The dark elf blade is a weapons used only in times of darkness and should not see the light of day. 60cm. Its blade is blackened with pure evil leaving only a shimmering edge in the darkness. Its hand grip has a finger hole to provide greater precision.

name: Scramasax Blade, 60cm
description: The ideal Viking weapon for close quarter combat is the scramasax. 60cm. Sometimes known as the Bowie knife this larp dagger cannot be easily concealed allowing your opponents to see what awaits them if they make a move.
